name: Tropelet
description:
Tropelet is a game about teleportation. You are a test subject that stuck in some sort of a lab experiments. Can you make it out?

This is a game jam title, a game that I made in 3 day. I challenge myself to make  a game in that short period of time, with a random game jam theme generator and I got teleportation theme. And so I manage to do just that.
